short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MSTR-PRO is an enhancement for MicroStrategy BI Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you formatting MicroStrategy RSDs or dossiers. Use:
- the Font Replacer Bot to apply a consistent font style by one click,
- the Design tool to tweak the design in presentation mode,
- the Image tool to search and apply images from the internet or intranet,
- copy thresholds between grids and documents with our Threshold tool
- the Inspector tool to debug and inspect data models and visualizations
